Title: Taking Stock
Description:
I was dispatched back to camp to gather pitch-tipped arrows for our archers at the bridge, and this is what I came to. I trained with most of these pandaren... I wasn't prepared for this.

Still, the archers at the bridge need our help. If you could help gather arrows from the wreckage, then maybe we can salvage something from this horror.
CompletionText: The pandaren at the bridge are depending on us...
RewardText: I... you... er, thank you. You didn't have to help, but you did. Thank you.
